headline: Hotels Use Wine as a Perk
abstract: ‘With so many lodging choices, wine programs offer companies another way to stand out.’
lead_paragraph: While overall wine sales have slowed in recent years, at least in the United States, oenophiles have started to consume more — and demand — better quality wines. To attract this traveler, hotels and resorts are increasingly ordering private-label bottles, producing their own and ramping up wine-centric experiences.
